segments.text: I'm just watching this woman, and I simply can't believe it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the constant running water from the sink?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: More importantly, how can she possibly not see those children behind her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are literally just a few feet away, trying to steal cookies!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is in such a dangerous position on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is clearly about to fall over, it's so unstable!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And she's just polishing a plate, completely unaware of any of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so incredibly frustrated to see such a complete lack of attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she realize the serious risks involved in this situation?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in and prevent a certain accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is entirely, almost obsessively, on that one dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are having a field day taking advantage of her distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout out loud and warn her immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of profound obliviousness can lead to real problems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly infuriating to witness this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
